text.title: BBC News - Breaking news, video and the latest top stories from the U.S. and around the world
text.text: BBC News - Breaking news, video and the latest top stories from the U.S. and around the world Skip to content British Broadcasting Corporation Home News Sport Business Innovation Culture Arts Travel Earth Audio Video Live Israel-Gaza War War in Ukraine US & Canada UK Africa Asia Australia Europe Latin America Middle East In Pictures BBC InDepth BBC Verify Home News Israel-Gaza War War in Ukraine US & Canada UK UK Politics England N. Ireland N. Ireland Politics Scotland Scotland Politics Wales Wales Politics Africa Asia China India Australia Europe Latin America Middle East In Pictures BBC InDepth BBC Verify Sport Business Executive Lounge Technology of Business Future of Business Innovation Technology Science & Health Artificial Intelligence AI v the Mind Culture Film & TV Music Art & Design Style Books Entertainment News Arts Arts in Motion Travel Destinations Africa Antarctica Asia Australia and Pacific Caribbean & Bermuda Central America Europe Middle East North America South America World’s Table Culture & Experiences Adventures The SpeciaList Earth Natural Wonders Weather & Science Climate Solutions Sustainable Business Green Living Audio Podcast Categories Radio Audio FAQs Video BBC Maestro Live Live News Live Sport Home News Sport Business Innovation Culture Arts Travel Earth Audio Video Live Weather Newsletters News News LIVE Putin 'morally responsible' for 'unsurvivable' Novichok poisoning of British woman, inquiry finds An inquiry into Ms Sturgess' death in 2018 came after an attempt to poison an ex-Russian double agent living in Salisbury. 'My heart breaks every time I'm called a hero' - Hong Kong fire survivor A survivor tells the BBC he feels guilty he didn't save more people from the blaze at his block of flats. 14 hrs ago Asia South Korea developing app that shows real-time location of stalkers Critics have voiced concern over the pervasiveness of stalking and violence against women in South Korea. 8 hrs ago Asia UK and Norway form naval alliance to hunt Russian submarines The partnership is designed to protect undersea cables, which Western officials say are increasingly under threat from Moscow. 2 hrs ago Europe Ukraine and US negotiators to meet in Florida after Moscow talks, White House says US special envoy Steve Witkoff will meet senior Ukrainian negotiator, Rustem Umerov, for talks in Miami on Thursday. 3 hrs ago Europe Meta starts kicking Australian children off Instagram and Facebook The tech giant will begin closing accounts for under 16s, a week before an official ban. 8 hrs ago Australia Oil, defence and geopolitics: Why Putin is visiting Modi in Delhi BBC editors explain what is at stake as Russian President Vladimir Putin starts a two-day visit to India. 13 hrs ago World Israel says Palestinian groups returned body of Thai hostage held in Gaza The remains of agricultural worker Suthisak Rintalak were recovered by Hamas and Palestinian Islamic Jihad in northern Gaza. 3 hrs ago Middle East Indian scientists spot Milky Way-like galaxy from 12 billion years ago Melbourne ex-childcare worker charged with more child rape offences Hong Kong orders removal of scaffolding mesh after deadly blaze Singapore court upholds guilty verdict for opposition leader Pritam Singh UK police accused of 'homophobic assumptions' over victims of blackmail on Grindr More to explore Cyclone catastrophe in Sri Lanka awakens volunteer spirit Fishing boats deliver relief supplies to flooded suburbs as community kitchens churn out food aid. 2 days ago Asia A speeding driver killed my parents - there needs to be a cultural change Claire Corkery wants attitudes to change on road safety after her parents were killed by a speeding driver. 13 hrs ago England Cough medicines or lemon and honey – which is better for you? What's the best way to deal with a cough and is lemon and honey as effective as medicine? 11 hrs ago Health They contracted hepatitis before the vaccine was given at birth - now the shot may be delayed again US health secretary Robert F Kennedy Jr has questioned the safety of the vaccine and downplayed the risk of contracting the virus. 1 hr ago Health 'Not becoming of a president': Somali-Americans respond to Trump's 'garbage' remarks Somali-Americans tell of their heightened fear after the US president intensified his criticism of the community. 8 hrs ago US & Canada Couple wed in front of strangers found on Reddit Harmony Elmy and Seán Mauremootoo eloped hundreds of miles to Cardiff for their unconventional wedding. 8 hrs ago Wales As World Cup draw approaches, are Trump and FIFA chief Infantino too close for comfort? Friday’s World Cup draw in Washington DC will be the latest illustration of the ever-closer relationship between US President Donald Trump and Fifa president Gianni Infantino. 5 hrs ago World Cup Most watched 1 Watch: Newly released video shows Jeffrey Epstein's private island home 2 Banquet, Royal Family and Starmer on first day of German state visit 3 Watch: What Tennessee's special election means for the Republican party 4 Watch: Hundreds of sheep cross historic German city during annual tradition 5 Customer secures refund after parcel theft caught on camera Also in news Hegseth could have endangered troop safety with Signal chat - Pentagon watchdog In sharing details about an attack in a group chat on the unsecured app, the defence secretary put troops at risk, inspector general finds. 12 hrs ago US & Canada Eurovision faces crucial decision over Israel Organisers of the song contest meet in Geneva on Thursday to debate Israel's role in the event. 13 hrs ago Europe Thailand relaxes afternoon alcohol ban to boost tourism The ban was primarily introduced to stop government employees from drinking during work hours. 1 day ago Asia Man charged with theft over claims he swallowed $19k Fabergé egg The egg pendant, which is set with 60 white diamonds and 15 blue sapphires, has yet to be recovered. 1 day ago Asia Court sides with Adidas in appeal over Kanye West collaboration Investors had accused Adidas of misleading them as its relationship with the rapper showed cracks. 11 hrs ago Business Production halted at Chinese factory making 'childlike' sex dolls The issue is in the spotlight after Shein announced a global ban on the sale of sex dolls with a childlike appearance. 24 hrs ago Asia More than 300 flights cancelled as Indian airline faces 'staff shortage' Indigo said the disruptions were caused by technical glitches and the impact of updated crew roster rules. 6 hrs ago Asia Most read 1 Oil, defence and geopolitics: Why Putin is visiting Modi in Delhi 2 Porn site fined £1m over age checks has never responded to Ofcom 3 'My heart breaks every time I'm called a hero' - Hong Kong fire survivor 4 UK and Norway form naval alliance to hunt Russian submarines 5 Indian scientists spot Milky Way-like galaxy from 12 billion years ago 6 More than 300 flights cancelled as Indian airline faces 'staff shortage' 7 Cough medicines or lemon and honey – which is better for you? 8 Previously unseen images of Epstein's island released 9 Moment earthquake shook homes in north-west England 10 Ukraine and US negotiators to meet in Florida after Moscow talks, White House says Sport 'Australia will have to admit he's a great' - Root hits elusive century Joe Root ends his long wait for a Test century in Australia by reaching three figures on day one of the second Ashes Test in Brisbane. 2 hrs ago England Trump and Infantino - too close for comfort? Friday’s World Cup draw in Washington DC will be the latest illustration of the ever-closer relationship between US President Donald Trump and Fifa president Gianni Infantino. 5 hrs ago World Cup LIVE Premier League news conferences: Edwards speaking with Wolves 12 points from safety All the latest from Thursday's Premier League news conferences as Wolverhampton Wanderers manager Rob Edwards, Tottenham boss Thomas Frank and others speak. McIlroy produces 'rollercoaster' opening round Rory McIlroy describes his one-over par round of 72 at the Australian Open at Royal Melbourne as a "rollercoaster". 4 hrs ago Golf Iran to attend World Cup draw after boycott threat A delegation from Iran will attend the 2026 World Cup draw in the US on Friday after threatening to boycott it over a visa row. 2 hrs ago Iran Newcastle want to be 'top club in world' by 2030 Newcastle United "in the debate about being the top club in the world" according to new CEO David Hopkinson. 3 hrs ago Newcastle 'It's hard to take... it hurts' - Fin Smith on losing England place Fin Smith admits he has found slipping down England's fly-half pecking order  tough to take, with George Ford the first-choice 10 during the autumn Tests. 1 hr ago Rugby Union British Broadcasting Corporation Home News Sport Business Innovation Culture Arts Travel Earth Audio Video Live Weather BBC Shop BritBox BBC in other languages The BBC is in multiple languages Read the BBC In your own language Oduu Afaan Oromootiin Amharic ዜና በአማርኛ Arabic عربي Azeri AZƏRBAYCAN Bangla বাংলা Burmese မြန်မာ Chinese 中文网 Dari دری French AFRIQUE Hausa HAUSA Hindi हिन्दी Gaelic NAIDHEACHDAN Gujarati ગુજરાતીમાં સમાચાર Igbo AKỤKỌ N’IGBO Indonesian INDONESIA Japanese 日本語 Kinyarwanda GAHUZA Kirundi KIRUNDI Korean 한국어 Kyrgyz Кыргыз Marathi मराठी Nepali नेपाली Noticias para hispanoparlantes Pashto پښتو Persian فارسی Pidgin Polish PO POLSKU Portuguese BRASIL Punjabi ਪੰਜਾਬੀ ਖ਼ਬਰਾਂ Russian НА РУССКОМ Serbian  NA SRPSKOM Sinhala සිංහල Somali SOMALI Swahili  HABARI KWA KISWAHILI Tamil தமிழில் செய்திகள் Telugu తెలుగు వార్తలు Thai ข่าวภาษาไทย Tigrinya ዜና ብትግርኛ Turkish TÜRKÇE Ukrainian УКРАЇНСЬКA Urdu اردو Uzbek O'ZBEK Vietnamese TIẾNG VIỆT Welsh NEWYDDION Yoruba  ÌRÒYÌN NÍ YORÙBÁ Follow BBC on: Terms of Use Subscription Terms About the BBC Privacy Policy Cookies Accessibility Help Contact the BBC Advertise with us Do not share or sell my info BBC.com Help & FAQs Content Index Copyright 2025 BBC. All rights reserved. The BBC is not responsible for the content of external sites. Read about our approach to external linking.

meta.og:title: BBC News - Breaking news, video and the latest top stories from the U.S. and around the world
meta.twitter:title: BBC News - Breaking news, video and the latest top stories from the U.S. and around the world
meta.description: Visit BBC News for the latest news, breaking news, video, audio and analysis. BBC News provides trusted World, U.S. and U.K. news as well as local and regional perspectives. Also entertainment, climate, business, science, technology and health news.

jsonld.description: Visit BBC News for the latest news, breaking news, video, audio and analysis. BBC News provides trusted World, U.S. and U.K. news as well as local and regional perspectives. Also entertainment, climate, business, science, technology and health news.
